title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs with parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with bacon and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices overnight.
Cook onions and add tikka masala paste.
Add cream and grilled chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with ripe avocado, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
instructions: Mash avocado with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
